bibl.title: Administrative Papyri from the Abbasid Court in Samarra (AD 836-892): A First Report.

series.title: Recherches et Rencontres. Publications de la Faculté des Lettres de Genève.

bibl.note: Presentation and discussion of 8 Arabic texts (written on papyrus, paper, marble and linen), found together in Samarra by Ernst Herzfeld in 1912-1913 and preserved in the Berlin Museum of Islamic Art (SMB). A full edition of the texts is in preparation.

bibl.title: Actes du 26e Congrès international de papyrologie. Genève, 16-21 août 2010.

bibl.seg: 140.8 P. Berlin Mus. für Islamische Kunst ined.
Reinfandt Lucian, Administrative Papyri from the Abbasid Court in Samarra (AD 836-892): A First Report.

Paul Schubert (Éd.), Actes du 26e Congrès international de papyrologie. Genève, 16-21 août 2010 = Recherches et Rencontres. Publications de la Faculté des Lettres de Genève. 30 (Genève, 2012) pp. 639-645.

Presentation and discussion of 8 Arabic texts (written on papyrus, paper, marble and linen), found together in Samarra by Ernst Herzfeld in 1912-1913 and preserved in the Berlin Museum of Islamic Art (SMB). A full edition of the texts is in preparation.
